verses.text: And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* toward the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against them,

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* to the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and to the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, to the \w rivers|strong="H0650"\w*, and to the \w valleys|strong="H1516"\w*; Behold, I, \add even\add* I, will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon you, and I will \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* your high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.

And your \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, and your \w images|strong="H2553"\w* shall be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*: and I will cast \w down|strong="H5307"\w* your \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \add men\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* your \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*.\f + \fr 6.4 \ft images: or, sun images\f*

And I will \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* the dead \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*; and I will \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* your \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* your \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*.\f + \fr 6.5 \ft lay: Heb. give\f*

In all your \w dwellingplaces|strong="H4186"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* shall be laid \w waste|strong="H2717"\w*, and the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H3456"\w*; that your \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* may be laid \w waste|strong="H2717"\w* and made \w desolate|strong="H0816"\w*, and your \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* may be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* and \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*, and your \w images|strong="H2553"\w* may be cut \w down|strong="H1438"\w*, and your \w works|strong="H4639"\w* may be \w abolished|strong="H4229"\w*.\f + \fr 6.6 \ft images: or, sun images\f*

And the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of you, and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Yet will I leave a \w remnant|strong="H3498"\w*, that ye may have \add some\add* that shall \w escape|strong="H6412"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, when ye shall be \w scattered|strong="H2219"\w* through the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*.

And they that \w escape|strong="H6412"\w* of you shall \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* me among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* whither they shall be carried \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*, because I am \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* with their \w whorish|strong="H2181"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, which hath \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from me, and with their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, which go a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*: and they shall \w lothe|strong="H6962"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6440"\w* for the \w evils|strong="H7451"\w* which they have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* in all their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.

And they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add and that\add* I have not \w said|strong="H1696"\w* in \w vain|strong="H2600"\w* that I would \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* unto them.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Smite|strong="H5221"\w* with thine \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, and \w stamp|strong="H7554"\w* with thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Alas|strong="H0253"\w* for all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*! for they shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and by the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*.

He that is far \w off|strong="H7350"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* of the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*; and he that is \w near|strong="H7138"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and he that \w remaineth|strong="H7604"\w* and is \w besieged|strong="H5341"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*: thus will I \w accomplish|strong="H3615"\w* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon them.

Then shall ye \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when their \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \add men\add* shall be \w among|strong="H8432"\w* their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* their \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, upon every \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*, in all the \w tops|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and under every \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, and under every \w thick|strong="H5687"\w* \w oak|strong="H0424"\w*, the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where they did \w offer|strong="H5414"\w* \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* to all their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*.

So will I stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon them, and \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, yea, more \w desolate|strong="H4923"\w* than the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* toward \w Diblath|strong="H1689"\w*, in all their \w habitations|strong="H4186"\w*: and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 6.14 \ft more…: or, desolate from the wilderness\f*
